channel.title: Straight vs LGBT(Lesbian, Gay, Bi, Transexual)
channel.description:
Ok We've seen penis vs vagina, now I have to wonder, would you guys prefer everyone in the world was straight? or do you guys have an open mind to allow the LGBT community to survive and thrive with out the threat of homophobes. ^^ Please sit and discuss your thoughts.
As for me, I'm open minded, and want the LGBT community to survive with out fear of being harmed. They are people too. and their sign, the Rainbow, is actually a sign of Diversity, multiple colors coming together to make something beautiful. There are more reasons for why the rainbow sign exists, but thats the original and my favorite reason. :stuck_out_tongue:
So feel free to hate me for supporting the LGBT community, but I know some good people in that community, and I can't help but love em like family. =D

item.title: Straight vs LGBT(Lesbian, Gay, Bi, Transexual)
item.dc:creator: Havelok
item.description:
Only a couple people (close friends) know I am bi.

In my personal opinion what goes on in my sex life is my business, it doesn’t define my me in any way. Plus, I plan on getting married and having kids anyway, so eventually I’ll have to stop playing around with guys in any case (unless my wife just happens to be into that sort of thing).

Read full topic

item.title: Straight vs LGBT(Lesbian, Gay, Bi, Transexual)
item.dc:creator: bur
item.description:
Slyr:

Eddie Izzard is teh sex. Discuss.

Me being straight notwithstanding, god yes.

Well I guess I could be considered bi to the extent of occasionally finding a man attractive. I wouldn’t do anything sexual though. Maybe kissing, but I haven’t wanted to kiss a man yet, so far.

item.title: Straight vs LGBT(Lesbian, Gay, Bi, Transexual)
item.dc:creator: danielsangeo
item.description:
Slyr:

I’m bi.
I’m also to lazy to read through 20 pages of what I’m sure is a few homophobes and lots of awesome people protecting my way of life (read ‘freedom, peace, love and heavy metal’).

Heavy metal is gay.

Who else here is out about their sexuality?

I’m straight.

item.title: Straight vs LGBT(Lesbian, Gay, Bi, Transexual)
item.dc:creator: IsolatedPurity
item.description:
Homosexuality is not “unnatural”.

It’s simply a genetical predisposition to same gender partnerships, and occurs through-out nature with-out any tampering done to the fetus. It’s a natural phenonemon.

Vaccines to protect ourselves against the flue, is far more “unnatural” than homosexuality.

But even if homosexuality was “unnatural”, so what? Only posers run around and whine like little bitches on the internets about other people’s sexual preferences.

Read full topic

item.title: Straight vs LGBT(Lesbian, Gay, Bi, Transexual)
item.dc:creator: DansonDelta40
item.description:
1. Repeatedly stated desire to be, or insistence that he or she is, the other sex.

  2. In boys, preference for cross-dressing, or simulating female attire. In girls, insistence on wearing only stereotypical masculine clothing.

  3. Strong and persistent preference for cross-sexual roles in make-believe play, or persistent fantasies of being the other sex.

  4. Intense desire to participate in stereotypical games and pastimes of the other sex.

  5. Strong preference for playmates of the other sex.

counting, counting…

Uh-oh…

Read full topic
